RESUME                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                      
                                                     
POSITION  APPLIED FOR                -   HEAVY DUTY DRIVER (Trailer ,Tanker, Trailer dump trucks )
TRUCK DRIVING EXPERIENCE           -    7 YEARS
FORKLIFT OPERATOR EXPERIENCE   -    5 YEARS
KEY SKILLS  :  
Driving Experience on  Trailer truck  , Tanker  truck , Trailer Dump  truck , mixer Truck, forklift truck
Knowledge  on Coupling & Un Coupling  procedure in Trailer 
Experience in  safe driving & secure transport  and having  operation  skill  with forklift for  Loading & 
Un loading  on Trailer.
Fork lift Operation Experience  on Warehouse and production areas . Having skills at  Different types of 
capacity  2 ton , 3ton , 5 ton ,7 ton  trucks.
Vehicle Pre –trip inspection ,Preventive Maintenance , Travel  log book and service maintenance and 
effective communication with  in- charge of  Transport  Authority 
Complete Familiarity with Driving Laws and Traffic rules and regulation  in GCC countries 
Good ability to read maps and follow directions to customer locations
Knowledge  with Ms office  ,Excel
Highly Professional and positive attitude
Fluent  English  Knowledge& basic  spoken knowledge in Arabic   for communication  with customers
COURSE OF CERTIFICATES :

    2 . Safe Transportation-hazardous  certificate  from Ashok Leyland driver training institute.
    3 . Fork lift Operator certificate from T VS & SONS
